text: Bareilly () is a city in Bareilly district, Uttar Pradesh, India. It is the capital of Bareilly division.https://web.archive.org/web/20170525141614/http://nclm.nic.in/shared/linkimages/NCLM52ndReport.pdf In 2015 Bareilly is selected one of the smartest cities of India. According to 2011 Census of India, the population of the city is 904,797 out of 477,515 are males and 427,282 are females. ==Notable people== *Anuj Tiwari (born 1988) – Author *Clayton Robson (1901–1989) – Cricketer * Disha Patani (born 1992) – actress *Kanan Gill (born 1989) – Actor, comedian *Kavita Seth (born 1970) – Playback singer *Kritika Kamra (born 1988) – Actress *Paras Arora (born 1994) – Actor *Priyanka Chopra (born 1982) – Actress *Priyanka Singh Rawat (born 1985) – Member of Parliament, Barabanki *Percy Pratt (1874–1961) – First-class cricketer *Rati Agnihotri (born 1960) – Actor *Santosh Gangwar (born 1948) – Minister of State (Independent Charge) for Labour and Employment == References == Category:Cities in Uttar Pradesh
title: Bareilly
